Key:
(My name is Shido Itsuka. I'm an ordinary high school
student.)

(So what am I doing this late in the night? Don't even
ask.)

(Well, it's kind of a secret that I'm at the bookstore
in front of the station to buy a book I really enjoy.)

...Just kidding. I just really wanted to read the
comic book that's coming out today.

It's rare that I'm out this late. I can't help but
feel so excited... Haha.

Oh, well... I'll just stop messing around and hurry
home.
Wh-What the?! That's bright!
You there. You have a moment?
Hm... This voice...
I'm going to have to ask you a few questions.

...Kotori, is that you? What are you doing dressed
like that...
...Hmph!
Hnrg! Wh-What the hell?!

And what's your problem? Talking to me like I'm your
friend. I'm a cop that was recently stationed here.
You watch how you speak to me.

Um, but you're totally Kotori! And... even if you were
a cop, what kind of cop punches someone they just
met?!
This kind. You're looking at her.
That's not something to be proud of!
What, you want to start a fight with me? Bring it on.
...Whatever, fine. So what do you want?
...Hmph!

Oof! What the... a second time... *cough*. I didn't do
anything!

You have an attitude problem. You're an outlier on
the fringes of society.

You're the one with the attitude problem! You hit a
random stranger twice.

Stop your bitchin' already. You look like a sex
predator. That level of grossness must be contagious.
No way! And I'm not a sexual predator!

I say one thing, and you talk back. I just asked you
to answer some questions. Or do you have something
to hide?

Damn it. I'm supposed to be responding with the
truth but why am I the one being sucked into this?
You're like my little sister.

I'm not talking about your super cute, wise little sister.
Just answer my question.

I mean, seriously, let's be honest. You're totally
Koto―
What's that?!
N-Nothing... So, what did you want to ask me?

(I can't expose my body to any more danger. I'm not
going to open my mouth anymore...)

There's been a sexual predator around here lately.
So I'm walking around asking questions.

I see. I didn't know that was happening. What do you
want to ask me...?
Right. Well, did you do it?
Trust me. I didn't do anything like that.

Who even asks that?! Wouldn't you normally ask the
individual if they saw anything?! Why are you asking
if I did it?

Shut up. I just phrased it wrong. Gosh. You're so
nitpicky.

(D-Damn it... It's not worth responding, I'll just get
tired...)

Anyways, ask me again. I don't think I'll be much
help, though.

Hmph, fine I'll ask again. So there's been a sexual
predator lately...
Yeah?
Now's your chance to come clean.
HOW IS THAT ANY DIFFERENT?!

Forget it. I'll answer first. I don't remember doing
anything, nor have I witnessed anything. I just want
to go home. Later.
Wait a minute.
(I'm going to ignore her. I'll just go home.)
I told you to HOLD ON!

OUCH! What the hell are you doing?! I'm an ordinary
civilian!

I already asked you nicely to wait. I had more questions
to ask, but you're the one who tried to go home.

Even if that was the case, what cop does a round-
house kick on a civilian?!
This one. You're looking at her.
Enough with that already! That's quite enough!

Jeez, what's your problem... Please, just let me go
home.

Hmph. Your attitude's starting to sound mighty
disobedient. Fine. Then I'll just get it over with.

You look like you're in high school. What are you
doing walking around this late? I don't think it's
appropriate for your age.
*Grunt* You're actually asking a legitimate question.

What were you doing out this late? Depending on your
answer, I may detain you.
Well, um...

(What do I do? I can be honest, but would Kotori be
satisfied with that? I'd rather just get this
conversation over with and go home.)

(But it doesn't mean that being honest will actually
accomplish that. I'll have to answer her in a way that
she'd be satisfied. I want to read my comic book!)
So then my answer should be...
I was hanging out at the arcade.
I was looking for a cute girl like you!
I was buying a comic book.

I was hanging out at the arcade in front of the
station. Excuse me.

(Instead of telling her the truth, I'll pretend I was up
to no good. It'll give her something to scold me about
and she'll get her fix...!)

I was going to go home earlier, but I was super into
it and lost track of time. I'm sorry.

I see. Got it. Then let's have you come down to the
station.
WHY?!

What do you mean, why? You were hanging out till
this late, right? I'm going to scold you properly, so
come with me to the station.
No, no, no, no! That's totally messed up!
Excuse me? Tell me, what about it is messed up?

Look at the time. Can't you just scold me a bit here
and then tell me to hurry home? I mean, that's normal!
Right. If it's normal.

Right? Then why am I being taken to the station?
That'll make my return home even later...

Because you don't look apologetic at all. You totally
have that I'll just act sorry and she'll let me off
(Crap... She's actually sharp.)
And besides...
What?

Your acting like you felt bad was gross. Almost like
an ugly dog kissing up.
That's so messed up!

Damn it, This is going nowhere. I'm just going to go
through!
Hey, wait!

Shut up. You're picking a fight with me. I just want
to go home and read my comic book! You get out of
my way!
AH!
Hyaaa!
...Oh, um.
Uh, that was... an accident...
Caught you red handed...
Excuse me?

An act of a bonafide sexual predator... Hehehe.
Hehehehe.
W-Wait. Let's talk about this! We can get through it!
Hehehehehe.

Wh-What's your problem? What's with that laugh all of
a sudden?
Hehehehe... Uhehehe.

Hey, listen, hot cop. You see... I was looking for a
cute girl like you hanging around town!
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

Oh come on, what's the problem? Why don't you come
to paradise with me!
No, no, no, no! Stop!

Come on, now. Did I scare you? You sure did a number
on me back there. Now it's your time, Miss Cop.
N-No!
(...I think this is enough.)
Just kidding.

I was only playing around, Miss Cop. I was just buying
a book. There's nothing suspicious...
(Well I did put some acting into it as payback.)
Ah... Ah...
What's the matter? Can't you get up?
*Grunt*... It was so sudden, I was just surprised...

Ah, you lost all feeling in your legs, huh... Sorry, I
guess I went too far.
...Sorry, can you lend me a hand?
O-Okay...
HMPH!
GAH!

How dare you make fun of me... Anyways... I guess we
have no choice but to do it.

What am I going to do?! You just said something really
scary!
I was out buying a book.

(I have nothing to hide. I'm sure if I'm honest with
her, it'll be okay.)

I see. Content that a high school student can't buy...
right? I mean, going out this late at night to buy it,
it's so suspicious.

I knew you'd say that! I totally knew it! I'm just
buying a comic book!

Hah, I doubt it. But if you insist, then I guess I can
take a look. What's inside that bag?
Fine. But as soon as you see it, let me go, okay?

(Honestly, I don't see why I have to show her, but
if I fight it, it'll be more of a nuisance. So I'm just
going to show her what's inside and go home.)
Wait. I'll open the bag now.
No, I'll open it myself, so hand it over.
I refuse. I mean, you could damage the pages.

*Grunt*... Fine. Hurry up, then. Who do you think I
am...

...A violent lady who'd punch someone as soon as
she met them?
Huh?!
...Nothing.
I see. Hurry up.

(*Sigh*... Seriously I want to get this over with. I
mean, the inside of this bag is...)
(Wh-What the. What's going on?)

(I bought a comic book at the bookstore. But why is
the content in this bag an erotic book...?!)

(I can't believe it. Right in front of me is an
inappropriate book. It even has the typical lewd
headlines.)
Wh-What the... Why? What happened...?!
I'm still waiting.
W-Wait!
...?! Wh-Why are you screaming all of a sudden?

Well, u-um... D-Don't move. Th-The tape. It's stuck
on the book. I'll take it off, so don't touch me, okay?
*Sigh*... What's taking you so long? Hurry up.
Y-Yeah. I'm working on it.

What's going on? Did the person at the register give
me the wrong item? No, I don't even care right now.
I have to get out of this situation.

The path that I thought would be the safest was the
worst trap. This is a book bomb. And it's about to
explode...! What are you going to do, Shido Itsuka?!

I need to get out of this bind. Do I show her? Show
her my book? That's the worst! I can't!

I'll have to make an excuse. No, it's not going to
fly. She's crazy violent. There's no way I'll survive.
She's not going to listen to what I have to say.

My only choice is to just plow through. If I run for it,
the gender difference should allow me to get away...

What are you mumbling about? Okay.. Time's up.
Hurry up and hand it over.
Oh...

You're bag is totally open. You shoulda hurried up and
given it to...
Haha... Um.
Oh, oh...

I-I'm actually into little sisters. I guess you're my
type? Just kidding... Hahaha.
...I see.
(I totally blew it. I think I stepped on the final mine.)
Public... misdemeanor...
It's over.
Why is this happening to me...

(The cop is shaking, breathing heavily in front of
me.)
Hey Miss Cop? Please calm down and let me explain.
How can I stay calm?!

P-Please wait. I couldn't help it. I was just
emotional. I totally feel bad!
Wait a minute! I won't let you get away with it!

(That day, my screams echoed throughout the starlit
town.)
